meanings.definition: A type of shrub with brittle branches and yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The brittlebushes in the desert sway gently in the wind.
meanings.sent2: We hiked through a field of brittlebushes on our nature walk.
meanings.sent3: The brittlebushes whispered secrets to each other in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The brittlebushes stood like fragile soldiers in the arid landscape.
meanings.sent5: The golden petals of the brittlebushes lit up the dry terrain.

meanings.definition: The plural form of brittlebush, referring to multiple shrubs of this type.
meanings.sent1: We admired the beautiful brittlebushes blooming along the trail.
meanings.sent2: The brittlebushes added a splash of color to the barren desert.
meanings.sent3: The brittlebushes gathered for a secret meeting under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The brittlebushes danced in the breeze, a golden sea of movement.
meanings.sent5: The brittlebushes painted the landscape with their vibrant hues.
